price: (29) He led me away from the remembrance[1020] after it had come to me. And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter."[1021]
arabic: لَّقَدۡ أَضَلَّنِي عَنِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَنِيۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولٗا
footnotes:
[1020]- i.e., the Qur’ān or the remembrance of Allāh.
[1021]- Forsaking him once he has led him into evil.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: laqad aḍallanī ʿani al-dhik'ri baʿda idh jāanī wakāna al-shayṭānu lil'insāni khadhūlan
